tags: tbips, systems administrator, systems administrator job, level 3, secret security
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Details

* **Title**: SharePoint OnPrem Administrator - DND
* **Solicitation Number**: W6952-25-0002
* **Date Published**: April 26, 2024
* **Closing Date**: May 13, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Contract Start Date**: June 03, 2024
* **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

#### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking a qualified SharePoint OnPrem Administrator to provide Task-based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS). This requirement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

The scope of work includes:

* Ensuring the availability and performance of the SharePoint 2019 farm
* Monitoring and troubleshooting any issues that may arise within the SharePoint environment

The contract is estimated to be approximately 9 months, with a proposed period from June 01, 2024, to March 31, 2025. The estimated level of effort for the contract will be 200 working days.

#### Eligibility

This procurement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-170432/B who qualify under the following stream(s):

* Stream 3: Information Management/Information Technology Service
* Category: I.9 Systems Administrator
* Level of Expertise: Level 3

**Note**: The procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses. Refer to Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual for more information on Indigenous business requirements.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Liam O'Toole
E-Mail: [liam.o’toole@forces.gc.ca](mailto:liam.o’toole@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 794-8299
Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Nepean, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Pre-Submission Meeting

A pre-submission meeting has been held with the following companies:

1. Acosys Consulting Services Inc.
2. Adirondack Information Management Inc.
3. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp. and Randstad Interim Inc
4. Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
5. Alivaktuk Consulting Inc. & NavPoint Consulting Group Inc. in JV
6. Makwa Resourcing Inc., TPG Technology Consulting Ltd. in JOINT VENTURE
7. Maple
